data.actual_result: You're no longer anchored at the bottom of chat
data.expected_result: You should remain anchored at the bottom of chat
data.short_description: Full screening a video while at the bottom of chat causes your client to scroll up slightly once you exit out of full screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel and send a video (YouTube or MP4 file) - Play the video and enter full screen - Exit full screen and observe your scrolled position
